short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Inspire brings you motivational quotes when you click the icon on the top-right.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Inspire is an extension dedicated to inspiring hope, vision, and change. With the extension, you can get hundreds of quotes from numerous authors to motivate yourself to create greatness.
